content:
Yield 89%. Crystallized as colorless blocks: IR (ATR) 3081, 3057, 3021, 2230, 1488, 1445, 1017, 751 cm−1; 1H NMR (500 MHz, DMSO-d 6) δ 8.57 (d, 2H, 3 J = 4.5 Hz), 8.51 (d, 2H, 3 J = 7.9 Hz), 8.13 (dd, 2H, 3 J = 9.1 Hz, 3 J = 7.9 Hz3), 7.70 (dd, 2H, 3 J = 9.1 Hz, 3 J = 4.5 Hz), 7.21 (bs, 8H); HRMS (ESI) calcd for [C16H16AgN12]+ m/e 483.06663, found 483.06888.

2:1 Complex of 6-(Pyrazin-2-yl)-1,3,5-triazine-2,4-diamine (<bold>2</bold>) with AgBF<sub>4</sub>

Yield 83%. Crystallized as pale yellow blocks: IR (ATR) 3455, 3367, 3311, 1615, 1593, 1563, 1520, 1451, 1374, 1159, 1056, 1009, 811, 570 cm−1; 1H NMR (500 MHz, DMSO-d 6) δ 9.61 (d, 2H, 4 J = 1.4 Hz), 8.98 (d, 2H, 3 J = 2.5 Hz), 8.71 (dd, 2H, 3 J = 2.5 Hz, 4 J = 1.4 Hz), 7.40 (bs, 8H); HRMS (ESI) calcd for [C14H14AgN14]+ m/e 485.05713, found 485.05844.

1:1 Complex of 6-(Pyrimidin-2-yl)-1,3,5-triazine-2,4-diamine (<bold>3</bold>) with AgClO<sub>4</sub>

Yield 71%. Crystallized as pale yellow blocks: IR (ATR) 3454, 3352, 3214, 1660, 1624, 1556, 1522, 1465, 1445, 1392, 1057, 1004, 799 cm−1; 1H NMR (500 MHz, DMSO-d 6) δ 9.00 (d, 4H, 3 J = 4.9 Hz), 7.80 (t, 2H, 3 J = 4.9 Hz), 7.35 (bs, 8H); HRMS (ESI) calcd for [C14H14AgN14]+ m/e 485.05713, found 485.05905.

2:1 Complex of 6-(Pyridin-2-yl)-1,3,5-triazine-2,4-diamine (1) with AgClO4 (Solvated Form)

Yield 89%. Crystallized as colorless blocks: IR (ATR) 3081, 3057, 3021, 2230, 1488, 1445, 1017, 751 cm-1; 1H NMR (500 MHz, DMSO-d 6) δ 8.57 (d, 2H, 3 J = 4.5 Hz), 8.51 (d, 2H, 3 J = 7.9 Hz), 8.13 (dd, 2H, 3 J = 9.1 Hz, 3 J = 7.9 Hz3), 7.70 (dd, 2H, 3 J = 9.1 Hz, 3 J = 4.5 Hz), 7.21 (bs, 8H); HRMS (ESI) calcd for [C16H16AgN12]+ m/e 483.06663, found 483.06888.

2:1 Complex of 6-(Pyrazin-2-yl)-1,3,5-triazine-2,4-diamine (2) with AgBF4 

Yield 83%. Crystallized as pale yellow blocks: IR (ATR) 3455, 3367, 3311, 1615, 1593, 1563, 1520, 1451, 1374, 1159, 1056, 1009, 811, 570 cm-1; 1H NMR (500 MHz, DMSO-d 6) δ 9.61 (d, 2H, 4 J = 1.4 Hz), 8.98 (d, 2H, 3 J = 2.5 Hz), 8.71 (dd, 2H, 3 J = 2.5 Hz, 4 J = 1.4 Hz), 7.40 (bs, 8H); HRMS (ESI) calcd for [C14H14AgN14]+ m/e 485.05713, found 485.05844.

1:1 Complex of 6-(Pyrimidin-2-yl)-1,3,5-triazine-2,4-diamine (3) with AgClO4 

Yield 71%. Crystallized as pale yellow blocks: IR (ATR) 3454, 3352, 3214, 1660, 1624, 1556, 1522, 1465, 1445, 1392, 1057, 1004, 799 cm-1; 1H NMR (500 MHz, DMSO-d 6) δ 9.00 (d, 4H, 3 J = 4.9 Hz), 7.80 (t, 2H, 3 J = 4.9 Hz), 7.35 (bs, 8H); HRMS (ESI) calcd for [C14H14AgN14]+ m/e 485.05713, found 485.05905.
